full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MGON YID BZHIN NOR BU DBYER MED KYI RNAL 'BYOR BSKANGS BSHAGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES BLA MA MGON PO YID BZHIN NOR BU DBYER MED KYI RNAL 'BYOR BSKANG BSHAGS GSOL 'DEBS DANG BCAS PA 'DI YANG BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MKHAN PO DKON MCHOG GRAGS PA LAGS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA DANG DU BLANGS TE, MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAMS KYI MAN NGAG BZHIN DU ^NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS SBYAR TE PHUL LO,, ,,)
